tool_description: Send SMS for 1 US Cent to USA or Canada via this API
name: 1 Cent SMS
title: 1 Cent SMS

api_list.name: SendSMS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1-cent-sms.p.rapidapi.com/default/SMSLambda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1-cent-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://1-cent-sms.p.rapidapi.com/default/SMSLambda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1-cent-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
